Job Title: Program Manager, Customer Immersion

Location: San Francisco, CA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Information Technology, Project Management

Description:
The successful candidate will join the Global Product Services (GPS) team within Meta’s Global Operations (GO) organization, dedicated to building a service engine that solves today's customers problems and prevents tomorrow's. The team combines deep product expertise with operational and analytical skills to design and manage scalable processes that support millions of advertisers across multiple products. GPS is made up of multiple teams that focus on connecting product teams with customers, alpha/beta product testing, and providing operational and technical support for business products.A Customer Immersion is a series of conversations that bring product teams and customers together around a focused topic, driving product development by creating a better understanding of real-life business challenges, market opportunities and industry insights. The management of the immersion experiences is critical in providing learning opportunities for our product teams, and in fostering mutually valuable exchanges between our partners and Facebook.As an Immersion Program Manager, you will partner with product teams (Product Marketing Managers, Product Managers, Designers, Researchers, Engineers, and others) to provide best in class end-to-end operational and strategic support to enable seamless and high-quality engagements with businesses. You will prioritize immersion requests and manage immersion execution, allowing FB product teams to connect with clients around the globe and creating a platform for business to share insights.

Program Manager, Customer Immersion Responsibilities:

Run cross-functional virtual meetings to understand immersion goals and to prepare teams for direct client interactionsWork with our Sales teams to identify appropriate clients for each client meetingWork directly with clients to coordinate scheduling of client meetings and set expectationsCompile key product and market information into client briefs and immersion prep documentsWork with vendors to provide in market translation supportCoordinate and lead team debrief sessionsCommunicate proactively to mitigate challenges, roadblocks in immersion preparationSimultaneously manage multiple immersion projects on different product teams

Minimum Qualifications:

2+ years of experience working in Operations, Strategy Consulting, or Program ManagementBachelor’s degreeExperience managing relationships in an organization both internally and externallyCommunication skills and experience collaborating with a team and cross-functional partnersExperience organizing project plans, setting priorities and developing timelines

Preferred Qualifications:

Experience in Sales or AdvertisingExperience working in a fast-paced, ambiguous environment

About Meta:

Meta builds technologies that help people connect, find communities, and grow businesses. When Facebook launched in 2004, it changed the way people connect. Apps like Messenger, Instagram and WhatsApp further empowered billions around the world. Now, Meta is moving beyond 2D screens toward immersive experiences like augmented and virtual reality to help build the next evolution in social technology. People who choose to build their careers by building with us at Meta help shape a future that will take us beyond what digital connection makes possible today—beyond the constraints of screens, the limits of distance, and even the rules of physics.

Meta is proud to be an Equal Employment Opportunity and Affirmative Action employer. We do not discriminate based upon race, religion, color, national origin, sex (including pregnancy, childbirth, or related medical conditions), sexual orientation, gender, gender identity, gender expression, transgender status, sexual stereotypes, age, status as a protected veteran, status as an individual with a disability, or other applicable legally protected characteristics. We also consider qualified applicants with criminal histories, consistent with applicable federal, state and local law. Meta participates in the E-Verify program in certain locations, as required by law. Please note that Meta may leverage artificial intelligence and machine learning technologies in connection with applications for employment.

Meta is committed to providing reasonable accommodations for candidates with disabilities in our recruiting process. If you need any assistance or accommodations due to a disability, please let us know at accommodations-ext@fb.com.

Experience Level (if available): None
